entry.title: Happy New Year
entry.content:
Greetings

Happy New Year, My friends. The year of snake have been past, the year of horse come to us. Thanks to you, cause you are the stength of my growing.

Recall

To be honest, I have hesitated in the last year. May be, I don’t know what i wanna go. My current work is managing our iOS Team. The situation is that I came from a website team and not familiar to technolgy of iOS. In my daily work, I spend more than 80% in our bussiness, like coordinating meeting of different departments. It is not technology it self, I found I were Project Manager more than a iOS tech leader. that makes me awesome and upset. What can i do and what i can be.

Fortunitly, I stopped my steps and considered what i have done, put more attention in technologies should be important, then, I bought some books and spent my time to watch the related totuar documents. Now, I feel good.

Chances are prepared for mans who are ready for it, I don’t want to be a loser, so i should put myself in a bowl full of hot water. I need try my best to learn both in tech and the manage.

Home

Lay on the bed in home, enjoying the relax. talk with mom and dad, that’s great, wishes all of you happiness.

Best Wishes.

entry.title: AngelHack Day
entry.content:
http://snacks.dreambuff.com
    The Entrance Of Your Mobile Web App. Here Your Go!

Two Wonderful Days

Last Satuday, I join a hackthon in IKC with my friends wov. Why I attend this activity? Maybe lacking practice of program makes me feel unset.

We met another friend, a graduate from DongNan Univercity, a very nice boy. we plan to start a project based on HTML5. This project provide an entrance of Web App. As we all know, web app become more and more popular in china , Almost all componies begin to pay more attentions to it, that’s great!

Division of labor

I used to write backend services before, so zjh and I were in charge of writing backend program. wov is good at frontend program, that’s his job. the backend program’s main language is nodejs, A javascript framework base on commonjs. OK, we were programing as this …

Episode before end

There will be half an hour before the end. After merging an code writen by wov, the picture can’t present correctly . that’s not an good news, we must fix this bug. fortunately, we fix this bug at last.

Write at the end

This activity is very meaningful, we met a new friend. we can complete a project in two days. if our passing is existed, the sky will be always blue.
